title: The history of a man.
author: Gilfillan, George
snippet: Wardlaw, Chalmers, and Brtiwn, when they met them on the streets of Edinburgh or Glasgow, saying in every gesture and look, ' Enjoy your same while ye may ; we bide our time ; and, please God ! we hope Goon to bury you in the light of our superior genius."
